definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: earth (= [[[אֲרַע]]]; [[ארקא]] Eg. Aram. S-C:Pap. B 15+oft. (sts. also [[ארעא]], as ib.:16), Ninev. and Bab. Aram. Cooke:192, also Mand. Nö:M§ 66, Zinj., Lzb:227 Cooke:166 (cf. 183); [[עקָ]], as Zinj. [[מוחאמָוקא]], [[רחהרָקי]], Cooke:166, 185; cf. K:§ 7:2 and anm. i and reff., Cooke:185 Nö:ZMG xivii (1893), 100; M § 66 Gunk:Schöpf. 18 Lzb:Eph. I. 223 SAC:JQ, 1903–4, 273);—emph. [[אַרְקָא]] Je 10:11.
